languages.text: "Лорд-капитан... Не сочтите за трусость, но долг обязывает меня спросить. Вы ведь отдаете себе отчет, что это, вполне возможно, путь в один конец?"
"Lord Captain... Don't take it as cowardice, but duty obliges me to ask. You do realise that this may end up being a one-way voyage, don't you?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан... Не сочтите за трусость, но долг обязывает меня спросить. Вы ведь отдаете себе отчет, что это, вполне возможно, путь в один конец?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain... Don't take it for cowardice, but I am obliged to ask. Do you realize that this, quite probably, might be a one-way journey?"
"Lord Captain... Don't take it for cowardice, but I am obliged to ask. Do you realize that this, quite probably, might be a one-way journey?"
"Lord Captain... Don't take it for cowardice, but duty obliges me to ask. Do you realise that this, quite probably, is a one-way journey?"
"Lord Captain... Don't take it for cowardice, but duty obliges me to ask. Do you realise that this, quite probably, is a one-way journey?"
"Lord Captain... Don't take it as cowardice, but duty obliges me to ask. You do realise that this may end up being a one-way voyage, don't you?"

languages.text: “舰长大人……请不要觉得我懦弱，但我有必要询问您：您是否意识到，一旦我们进入次元门，就可能再也回不来了？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... Don't take it as cowardice, but duty obliges me to ask. You do realise that this may end up being a one-way voyage, don't you?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人……请不要觉得我懦弱，但我有必要询问您：您是否意识到，一旦我们进入次元门，就可能再也回不来了？”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... Ne prenez pas cela pour de la lâcheté, mais je me dois de vous poser la question. Vous rendez-vous compte qu'il s'agit probablement d'un voyage sans retour ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... Don't take it as cowardice, but duty obliges me to ask. You do realise that this may end up being a one-way voyage, don't you?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... Ne prenez pas cela pour de la lâcheté, mais je me dois de vous poser la question. Vous rendez-vous compte qu'il s'agit probablement d'un voyage sans retour ? »

languages.text: "Lord Captain ... Ich frage Euch das nicht aus Feigheit, sondern aus Pflichtgefühl. Ist Euch klar, dass wir uns möglicherweise auf einer Reise ohne Wiederkehr befinden?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... Don't take it as cowardice, but duty obliges me to ask. You do realise that this may end up being a one-way voyage, don't you?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain ... Ich frage Euch das nicht aus Feigheit, sondern aus Pflichtgefühl. Ist Euch klar, dass wir uns möglicherweise auf einer Reise ohne Wiederkehr befinden?"
"Lord Captain ... Seht es nicht als Feigheit an, aber ich fühle mich dazu verpflichtet zu fragen. Ist Euch klar, dass das höchstwahrscheinlich ein Flug in nur eine Richtung ist?"

languages.text: «Lord Capitán... espero que no me tome por cobarde, pero el deber me exige que se lo pregunte. ¿Se da cuenta de que es probable que este sea un viaje solo de ida?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... Don't take it as cowardice, but duty obliges me to ask. You do realise that this may end up being a one-way voyage, don't you?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán... espero que no me tome por cobarde, pero el deber me exige que se lo pregunte. ¿Se da cuenta de que es probable que este sea un viaje solo de ida?».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン…。臆病だと思われたくはないが、聞かなくてはいけないことがあります。これが片道航海に終わるかもしれないことは、承知の上ですよね？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... Don't take it as cowardice, but duty obliges me to ask. You do realise that this may end up being a one-way voyage, don't you?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン…。臆病だと思われたくはないが、聞かなくてはいけないことがあります。これが片道航海に終わるかもしれないことは、承知の上ですよね？」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan... Korkaklık ediyor gibi görünmek istemem ama vazifem beni bu soruyu sormaya itiyor. Bu yolculuğun tek yönlü olabileceğini biliyorsunuz, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... Don't take it as cowardice, but duty obliges me to ask. You do realise that this may end up being a one-way voyage, don't you?"
